## Data Processing
1. The R package `Tidyverse` is main tool in this analysis.
```{r, package, message=FALSE}
require(tidyverse)
```
2. Load the data download from assignment website without unzip.
```{r, load data, message=FALSE}
dt <- read_csv("repdata-data-StormData.csv.bz2")
```
3. Select and filter the data we need to find the answers to the two questions, and group it by severe weather types.
```{r, filter data, message=FALSE}
dt_1 <- dt %>% select(BGN_DATE, BGN_TIME, EVTYPE, )
```
